events.text: Hwlo there! Kulrik! It's a pleasure to see you!
Who are you? How do you know my name?
I know everything child. I also know you want to leave this place. I even know the exit.
Of course! To escape this hellscape you have to meet the demonlords and beat them! Remember one thing although, if you lose your sanity you will never be able to leave this place.
Thanks good sir! I will try to remain sane! Can you tell me where to find these demon lords?
Remember kid, these demonlords are not forces to be reckoned with! They are hateful and hard to defeat! You might lose your sanity forever!
That's fine sir! Please just tell me where to go!
If you insist so much.. Go left till you reach a statue. Activate the statue and you will reach the first demonlord.
